name: Signpost
author: Joe123
info: Turns the combo underneath the ffc into a signpost.
description: Turns the combo underneath the ffc into a signpost.
setup:
Place the ffc exactly on top of a solid combo with a signpost graphic.
Give the ffc this script, and a transparent combo that's not combo 0
D0 is the message string to play
D1 is which button to check for when reading the singpost, 0 is A, 1 is B, 2 is L and 3 is R

The script will only function correctly with both the 'Messages Freeze All Action' and the 'Messages Disappear' Quest Rules checked.

Note: This script uses a number of functions common to some other scripts of mine in the database. These functions should only be included in your script file once
